website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive canopy tent perfect for any outdoor activity, with extra shelter from both sun and rain thanks to included side walls.
pros: Multiple colors to choose from helps customize any party
The removable walls with clear windows can be kept open for easy access in and out
Easy to set up, and plenty of room inside for both guests and tables
cons: Weight bags suggested for extra security on windy days
legs can bend if left up for too long
May require extra people for set up

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together. My husband and I were able to do it with just the two of us. The side walls are all individual pieces so putting those up took some time. The material is pretty thin, but we used it on a 95 degree sunny day with a portable AC unit and it was really nice in there! We were able to fit 3 tables with chairs. We are really happy with this tent!
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Bear

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent, guests were impressed!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this tent for the food tables for a wedding. It is spacious and light with all the windows. It held up to the occasional rain and wind over the weekend, but by the third day there was some water getting through. I wouldn't buy this for a long-term situation, but for a party or gathering I would. It was very easy to put up, two people could probably manage but we used four. If it is breezy, definitely stake it to the ground, or it will lift up or blow away.
customer_reviews.author: geeno

customer_reviews.title: ... took 5 minutes to put up and I absolutely loved it! It was exactly what I was looking ...
customer_reviews.text: It took 5 minutes to put up and I absolutely loved it! It was exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: We set up in about 25 min (it was cold)... Inside easy to decorate and plenty of room for two picinic tables and a buffet table. Take down was about 20 min as well! So nice to roll it in the garage in the bag that came with it ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Bettina

customer_reviews.title: Very very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this super fast, no directions but i watched couple different utube videos & figured it out. I put together & took down by myself just took my time will he quicker next time, now i know how. I'm 5 ft 5" & 55 yr old lady with health issues but it wasn't too bad, hardest thing was rolling it down to the garage it weighs a bit but got that too, instead of trying to drag it, I stood it up & held it in front of me & guided it, a lot easier. Very very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.author: Nana H

customer_reviews.title: ... and it stayed up the entire time through a pretty bad storm
customer_reviews.text: It ended up raining the night of my grad party and it stayed up the entire time through a pretty bad storm! It was awesome! Definitely will last you long term. And was very easy to put up took about 5-10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Lynn Bantz

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be happier. Very easy to put up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "just in case" it rained on the day of my party. I couldn't be happier. Very easy to put up. The first time you have to attach the tent before you fully extend the tent. The side wall are also easy to attach. I thought I was getting all 4 sides for the tent, but didn't realize that they come in 10 foot sections. Therefore "4 sidewalls" equals 3 sides of the tent. Spend the extra 10 dollars and get the "6 sidewall" option if you want to completely enclose the tent. I actually set this up by myself but I wouldn't recommend it. Get some other people and it would be super fast.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie

customer_reviews.title: Super tent!
customer_reviews.text: Super tent!!! Would buy more and will as needed. Recommended to my friends and we’re all buying one. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: WJH

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This tent worked great for a rainy Saturday party. Easy enough to put up and stake down. Lots of space and looks nice. This will be helpful for many years to come.
customer_reviews.author: LMH

customer_reviews.title: Good quality purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for bbq competitions. Can be popped up with 2 people but 3 makes it a lot easier. Pretty sturdy and kept us cool in the midday heat. Most likely going to order another one.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Great tent.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy and like the color. I wish they had sold individual walls separately. Does the job as sold. The fabric roof seems a bit tight to fit the frame but with a little bit of effort it does.
customer_reviews.author: vamshi k gooje

customer_reviews.title: Easy setup and good product
customer_reviews.text: Works great in the rain very satisfied with their purchase easy product to set up
customer_reviews.author: one love

customer_reviews.title: Worked as it Said it would!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent for my daughter's graduation party. Wouldn't you know it, it had to rain. Everyone stayed pretty dry, the tent held up through the wind gust and all. Over all it was easy to set up. Took me and a friend about 10 minutes. If your are looking for an easy shade thrower this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Mckinney

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: This canopy is very big! It is very suitable and easy to install in the backyard. It will be used for sunshade and barbecue party this summer
customer_reviews.author: jerry yu

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up. We are using ours on our Patio. Time will tell how well it will hold up. So far I love it. Now has been up a few weeks and has weathered some good storms. lowered back legs to make sure water rolled off the back and it is holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: Min 2 person for set up
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy set up, but best to install with at least two people. Recommend frame to be opened only partially before placing canopy over top.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Khosrowshahi

customer_reviews.title: Good canopy - Carrying case isn't very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We like the canopy, it's easy to set up for concerts/vendors. Not very impressed with the carrying case/cover. Moving it from my house to vehicle, the material ripped around the handle - kind of defeats the purpose of using the handles to carry/move the canopy. Very thin material and have a feeling it won't last the season. The canopy on the other hand is pretty nice. Easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: n8vspud

customer_reviews.title: Is HUGE!!!😍
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVEEEEE THIS CANOPY. IS JUST BEAUTIFUL. MOST IMPORTANTLY VERY STRONG,GREAT QUALITY. I USED IT FOR MY DAUGHTERS 6TH BIRTHDAY AND PPL IN THE PARK HAD TO STOP TO ASK WHERE DID I GET IT FROM AND TO SAY HOW BEAUTIFUL IT IS😍😍😍 NOT ONLY I RECOMMENDED FOR A PRINCESS BIRTHDAY PARTY, BUT FOR ALL YOUR OUTDOORS ACTIVITIES!!!! CANT WAIT TO TAKE IT TO THE BEACH!!!
customer_reviews.author: ELONY GUERRERO

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately there we a slight tear on the top cover of the canopy. I tried to reinforce with duck tape after assembling and it dropped through the one pole. Rain started to fall and the weight of the rain and the fact that the top cover was uneven made it collapse on us. Luckily no one was seriously hurt. We purchased in May and set it up this past weekend for a Father's Day gathering. Sad and disappointed we didn't get to enjoy having it. Did not expect such a flimsy outcome after spending $250.00. Wasted my hard earned money.
customer_reviews.author: Chenise Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Got it ready for the summer party ,All my kids was born at summer my house is small that doesn’t have space to celebrate there birthday party I realized we need a outdoor party tent.Its a good size with my backyard,quick installation and shipping fast.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent from birthday party and it was great it poured down rain one small leak where the seams meet but it is definitely worth the money I’ve had it up now for three weeks need to take it down I love it
customer_reviews.author: jean marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Great product. Recommend heartily as one using tents regularly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Milton

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Extremely flimsy. The tent will collapse under light wind. After a month of use, most of the legs are now warped and the canopy has faded. Avoid!
customer_reviews.author: Dong Ngo

customer_reviews.title: ... item today and put it together everything was in excellent condition plus the shipping was excellent well recomment thank
customer_reviews.text: I got the item today and put it together everything was in excellent condition plus the shipping was excellent well recomment thank you
customer_reviews.author: Pooh

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - as expected.
customer_reviews.text: OK for the price, if you don't need it to be up long term, it should be fine. Easily erected by 2 people. It arrived bent, one of the corner seams started shredding immediately. With lines and stakes it was secure in very strong winds though, so that was good. Did what we needed it to do.
customer_reviews.author: S. Gerow

customer_reviews.title: This tent is big! I absolutely love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Newest addition to my camping gear collection!! I’m so satisfied with the tent I bought 2!!! And the company’s customer service is outstanding!!
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Yamamoto

customer_reviews.title: Not quite white
customer_reviews.text: Used this once so far for a backyard wedding. The color is more of a silver than a typical white. The white fabric is thin and the under fabric is silver for reflection of heat I'm guessing. No way one person could set this up themselves without bending a pole. We had a person on each leg (6). I think if we didnt we could have bent something easily. Not the flimsiest I've seen but could b sturdier. It's very heavy as is so it would b difficult to move even with the wheels if it was
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been a great buy. Easy pop up to cover a big area .
customer_reviews.author: valentin

customer_reviews.title: The new way to party during COVID-19
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the "birthday party in a tent" due to COVID-19. Heavy box delivered, easy to unpackage, no damage. It took 4 people to put up in order to safety prop and open in sync. It took a stronger person to hold up the middle in order to equally adjust the legs to proper height. Velcro top and sides was super easy!!. Small gaps between walls gave good ventilation. All walls fit every side so picking it to fit your space is simple. Very happy with size and product.
customer_reviews.author: Sleepyhollow

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 4 months and the frame has held up great. However, the canopy itself is super brittle and has torn to shreds with even the slightest amount of wind. They don't sell a replacement canopy either and we've had to resort to buying a tarp and ziptying it to the frame. If you only need it for a a limited time event, this is great. However if you want to keep using it I would expect a short life expectancy on this tent.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T.

customer_reviews.title: enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: We live in south so the summer is long. Right now it is very hot already so we do need a gazebo in our backyard especially since our house faces east so in the afternoon or in the evening there was no shade in the backyard and it was very hot! The Gazebo is sturdy and easy to install, and also large enough for the whole family. We had a lot more outdoor activities in the backyard since then. It was quite enjoyable to sit in shade after dinner afer a day's work. BTW we already had a birthday party under it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex W.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this tent!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tent for my daughter’s 1st birthday and I’m extremely satisfied with it. I researched tons of tents and decided to purchase this one based on the reviews. It only requires 2 people and took less than 10 minutes to assemble and take down. It comes with a sturdy storage bag that has wheels which is super convenient. It stores well and travels well. Very happy with this purchase, it was a great investment for future events.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loved this tent.
customer_reviews.text: Tint was fabulous, held up great, easy to put up, and absolutely gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Angry bc I love je

customer_reviews.title: For the price it looks good.
customer_reviews.text: For Budget that it looks good side walls are just a little cheesy the way they Velcro on but they look good at the end. Framers not too heavy to carry. Carrying bag seems decent.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Buggert

customer_reviews.title: Takes a few people to set up
customer_reviews.text: Good party tent, not the greatest quality, but on par with most other cheap ones that are available these days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for party!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a party and it worked out well. It shipped to us super quickly and was a breeze to set up. It was a hot day and this helped keep everyone outside and happy instead of stuck in the house. The 20x10 canopy looked nice. It was easy to put up and take down with at least 2 people helping. Me and my husband had it set up in about 15 mins. The frame seems very sturdy and top is a decent thickness, great size as well! It came with a great Roller carrying bag for storage which we somehow managed to loose. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on this purchase due to the price and some of the reviews. I was worried it would be cheaply made and difficult to put together. I was wrong, and I'm okay with admitting it! The tent looks great and was exactly what we needed for our party. It offered the perfect amount of shade from the hot day and was really a nice touch to the party. This is a great product thus far! Customer service reached out with an email saying if there is anything we needed, just to let them know.
customer_reviews.author: LTD

customer_reviews.title: The Frame bends easily
customer_reviews.text: I really like the concept of a pop up canopy of this size on my deck. However, even with racing out to remove the canopy whenever there is any amount of wind over 5mph, the frame twisted and bent. I can no longer take down the frame because the legs are mangled. The cover is usually removed because it takes 2 people plus a ladder to put it on and then must be removed in case a storm brews overnight.
customer_reviews.author: jainadru

customer_reviews.title: Great for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for weekend use around our pool. Pros (product): looks great, roomy inside, not difficult for 2 people to put up, very easy to dismantle between uses. Cons (seller): told shipping would take 2 weeks, which was fine...HOWEVER it took almost 4 weeks for item to be delivered (even though the $ amount was taken from account within hours of ordering).
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The corners are not reinforced like other canopies..it tore on first setup
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue was like most canopies they did not reinforce the corners of the canvas . Due to this the canopy tore on the corner on 1st installation. Plus they didn't design this well where the top can easily be misaligned and when you expand the canopy it can pull more one one side than other and easily rip. Will not buy this again!!
customer_reviews.author: TonyP

customer_reviews.title: this thing leaks like a sieve the seams all leak do not buy ...
customer_reviews.text: Junk, this thing leaks like a sieve the seams all leak do not buy this the frame is a rickity peice of junk Well okay maybe we were a bit harsh, thanks the local hardware store ,t we procured a tarp to use as a cover and got the leg straightened out so we can use it. Then just throw it away when were done,, we only needed it for 1 event so not that big a deal. But if you want something fro long term it is not this one
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy quality fabric and sewing.
customer_reviews.text: The frame itself seems sturdy enough but the fabric is very thin. Some of the seams have already started separating and I don't expect the fabric to last for more than a few months. The thickness of the fabric is about that of a windbreaker. Most of it is single stitched. I would return it but the weight is such that I would have to pay a great deal in shipping, so it is not worth returning. I feel like a sucker regarding the fabric. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: David M

customer_reviews.title: It stood against the storm!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say I am pleasantly surprised at the durability after some of the reviews I read. I was using for a 3 day flea market. The very first night we had a storm and the tent beside us was demolished while this one had just one corner that we had issues with and I think that was someone not taking the time to tie it down properly. It could have been really bad! I sell jewelry and it could have been disastrous. But it stood against the forces of nature! And...having a pink tent...everyone can find you easily. It was great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Trimble

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BUT,
customer_reviews.text: THIS TENT COMES WITH A GREAT STORAGE BAG AND 6 WALLS. IT IS VERY STURDY, LOOKS GREAT AND WAS GOOD IN A LIGHT RAIN. BUT, TAKE IT DOWN AFTER USE IF YOU WOULD LIKE TO PRESERVE IT. I FORGOT TO AND ONE WINDY RAINY NIGHT WAS ALL IT TOOK TO TEAR THE LEGS APART AND BEND THE FRAME. BUT, I WILL PURCHASE AGAIN AND AFTER USE I'LL TAKE IT DOWN.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This Canopy worked very well on a camping trip. It had space for 2 large tables, grill, and small table to store cooking utensils. We were able to sit under it while it rained. It you zip all the walls, during summer the inside will get hot quickly. Unzip the walls and tie them back and the breezes flow easily inside. Great purchase for my Youth Group to take camping! It takes 3-4 people to put up easily but 2 could put it up if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Annapolisshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great tent.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my business. It's great. Holds the rain off well. Love the color
customer_reviews.author: Katina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Louisiana Thunderstorms
customer_reviews.text: The tent is awesome. It was ordered for a Louisiana crawfish boil. It was fantastic in providing shade. What I discovered is how durable the text is. The tent held UP great against three thunderstorms. After the storms I expected to find the tent in the neighbors' yard. No, it held up like a tree, Wow!
customer_reviews.author: DEBRA A

customer_reviews.title: Instructions were not clear
customer_reviews.text: Tent looked great set up but you definitely needed 3 or 4 people to set it up properly. Also instructions were not clear on the tarp assembly. Not wise to secure tabs on tarp until tent is completely set up. Ripped one corner of tent, had I known this prior and clearly written in insructions this wouldn't have happened. Also wiping down inside window panels smudged the window design! I'm hoping I can get a replacement tarp and sidewall.
customer_reviews.author: SabrinaT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I Love this tent so much! cheap and good design! Strong recommend
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for summer bbq where rain was threatening. Kept several parties going despite drizzle. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Porter

customer_reviews.title: A great tent for any party occasion!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tent for a graduation party. It was very easy to assemble. The sides are easy to put up and take down. I hung lights in the center. It was a lifesaver when it started to rain on my party but our guests stayed dry. I used it on a patio so you will need to use weights if it is windy or it comes with stakes to use in the grass. I purchased this for less than what it would have cost me to rent one. I already have people asking to borrow it or they may just purchase one for themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Lilsis

customer_reviews.title: tears the first time up
customer_reviews.text: The first time I put it up one of the outside poles ripped through the ceiling/top. The poles have a second flap that helps protect the ceiling/top from tears but the flaps easily fold to one side and when they do that they do not provide the support needed. These flaps have to be positioned between the poles and the ceiling/tops to work. The design of these flaps should have tacked them down so that they always are in position. What this really means is that the topper is way to thin.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Butler

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I held a company picnic under this tent and would recommend it to anyone with a large group. I would also suggest sandbags or similar weights ... this is a large sail. Needs to be held to the ground.
customer_reviews.author: DZW

customer_reviews.title: An inch of rain was too much for the frame
customer_reviews.text: This tent was easy to construct and attractive, but didn't survive an inch of rain. In the past we have left tents up over the summer, so we left this up for a few days after the church event. After a storm with one inch of rain, the weight of the water destroyed the tent! The metal twisted and broke, leaving it impossible to repair. This was a very expensive lesson! Take it down right away. Or buy something stronger!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: Great canopy!! I do recommend it. Used it for a graduation party. Not flimsy at all!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy or worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This product only lasted a couple months in our yard. We used this for the heat in southern california and it completely destroyed after a tear appeared. Then after trying to patch the tear, the entire canopy ripped and now we have a tall pole sticking out. Completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: L. Scaccianoce

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It came with 4 sides, a bag with wheels, anchors to secure down and a minimum of 2 people is required to put up. My wife brought it for my small birthday gathering. It was very spacious. I would recommend taking it down if you know heavy winds are in the forecast.
customer_reviews.author: Phildeez

customer_reviews.title: Quality tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: For this price this tent is awesome. I did my due diligence when choosing which one to buy and despite the other reviews saying it's not sturdy enough, this tent exceeded my expectations. Super easy to put up and take down. Definitely worth it, maybe just don't leave it out in a windstorm
customer_reviews.author: curious_hair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Used it on our Ham Radio Field Day and it worked flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Shortwaver

customer_reviews.title: Get it Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Took us a good minute to figure out how to raise it but it was well worth it. So strong. It was windy and we didn’t use weight bags or the strings . Didn’t move an inch! Also there was only two of us putting it up and we got it up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Very light and flimsy, poor construction
customer_reviews.text: The very first time I took this out, the carry handle ripped the carrying bag. When assembled, the frame was so warped and out of alignment, only three legs would be on the ground at any time. The top is very thin, and I'm sure will wear through very quickly. We purchased this for a very specific purpose and it likely won't get used much, so it may work for a little bit, if I can bend the frame without breaking it. I think I would have been better off buying 2 10'x10's of a reputable brand and zip tying them together when they were assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for the party.
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for my granddaughters graduation party. We put up one - it wasn't too hard to put up, but it does take at least 2 and preferably 4 people. Nice & big, worked well for the party. Thought we'd keep it up as a deck cover. However, a little wind the next day wreaked havoc with the tent so we took it down right quick. Definitely works for a party but not for a summer deck cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Bertucci

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very well made and not difficult at all to put up for the excellent price paid
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pink color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Perfect size and easy to put together. The only issue i have is that some of the metal parts were dented. It’s still usable. Otherwise i would have given it 5 stars if it wasn’t for the dents. I have at least 5 photos with the dents but it would only let me upload one picture
customer_reviews.author: Tuffluck34

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was looking for. It’s really easy to use and take down. The set up process only takes about 5 minutes with the help of three people. We are pleased with the quality, size and it makes our outdoor party a success!!
customer_reviews.author: J. J

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk , I just opened it for the first time August 30th , the top ripped before it was even setup all the wall . Thinnest material I have ever seen . The stakes are useless , I had a storm come through an hour after it was setup and it pulled the stakes right out and broke the frame in three places . Went to try and return it today and it says my return date deadline was August 31st , so now I am stuck with this garbage . Dont waste your money on this pathetic excuse for a tent.
customer_reviews.author: todd glacken

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Gazebo Tent Shelter with Removable Side Walls
customer_reviews.text: Had very little trouble setting this up. Use the duct tape recommended by other reviews just for extra security. It took 3 to set up and was ready in 45 minutes. Looked fantastic. I’ll be able to use this for other events since everything is still in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Poon

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us even on a slightly windy day
customer_reviews.text: This was better than the canopy that had individual pieces that broke apart. This is like a typical easy up canopy that has 1 accordion like piece. You definitely need more than 1 person to open this up. We needed at least 3-4 people.
customer_reviews.author: Twinsplus1

customer_reviews.title: Seams are questionable
customer_reviews.text: Great size! Easy to put up! But seams open up. If there’s a bit of wind, don’t use the clips to hold top down. Will rip easy. Company did replace too quickly. Needs a different material for top
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Fabric tore in wind
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose only when it is bright and sunny. The moment we had the slightest winds (in California where the weather is not even drastic), the fabric on top tore in several places so unable to replace it or return it. This is our second purchase for a patio cover from Amazon. Same experience of fabric tear with the first one that we bought too. The hassle of not being able to return because it's been a few months and now having to deal with a huge stand and torn fabric is just not worth it. Terrible experience.
customer_reviews.author: Guru Baskar Pattabhiraman

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good canopy
customer_reviews.text: The canopy top I very thin, it ripped the first time we opened it. It did however withstand the rain.
customer_reviews.author: JkUrbs

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price No Doubt
customer_reviews.text: This tent is definitely worth the money. It won't hold up in a storm that's for sure but a light wind or drizzle it doesn't have a problem. Was relatively easy to put up and take down. The only problem that we had was one of the panels was stitched upside down so the windows are upside down but this doesn't bother us in the least we didn't even contact the seller about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Material not that strong. Don’t leave up to long. Will fade in sun. Frame was ok.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Canopy RIPPED on first assembly.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this item... but the canopy RIPPED on first assembly. It was beautifully packed and easy to install (needed for 4 people) but as we were elevating the legs, a hole ripped in the corner. And that’s that. Does NOT include removable sides like the product title had eluded to. Another misleading aspect! I would keep the pop up if I could get a replacement canopy... because it’s still a good value for the $.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Very glad to have it finally, one pole is dinged but otherwise was exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Very glad to have it finally, took 3 extra weeks to receive - order well in advance of needing. One pole is dinged but otherwise was exactly what we were looking for. They responded to all our inquiries within 24 hours and maintained contact even with dinged pole.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction, ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and tKe down. Our deck has different levels and it’s easy to adjust length of legs to accommodate the differences. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: M Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble, didn’t need 4 people, 2 adults are enough. Looks awesome! Would suggest an improvement on the walls, they’re ok but the straps doesn’t allow to fix them strongly to the posts. Minor issue of course. Great value for the prize
customer_reviews.author: Yosnina

customer_reviews.title: Great for outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: My neighbors and I just used this canopy tent over the weekend for our neighborhood BBQ party. It provided a great cooling area for us to store our food. The set up wasn’t too complicated, but I would recommend to have some weight bags for the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Ladd

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: A total waste of money. I purchased it to use for sorting items and keep them dry. Within a week it leaked in the rain and the wind blew it over and into a tree even though it was weighted down - twice! The string provided for tie-downs literally disintegrated so we replaced them. To the company's credit they sent me a new top to replace the torn one. But within a month it too had torn, then just shredded. I was never able to use it for my sorting.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Norris

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Frame and cover are good quality I suggest add foam on top of frame when packaging it I use it for grad party can fit enough 3 of 6feet tables for 25 persons at least
customer_reviews.author: Pet kps

customer_reviews.title: Get the warranty!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up but I’d highly suggest getting warranty after setting it up for an hour in the yard with wind I wish I had gotten the warranty because the seems are very very weak on the roof canopy where you hold down with the straps to bars and a few we’re tearing almost already..
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Canopy
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy frame the canopy could be stronger but seems like a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Jake Dawson

customer_reviews.title: its value for money
customer_reviews.text: its easy to assemble and looks good. packaging was good
customer_reviews.author: VenkatV

customer_reviews.title: We love our new heavy duty pop-up canopy!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new heavy duty pop-up canopy! This is exactly what we were looking for! It is well-made, the material seems durable, and the construction is very sturdy. We got more than we paid for! Overall, I am very happy
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Needs a little bit more stretch on the top and better threading
customer_reviews.text: Nice product but had a difficult time with the top portion of it trying to pull it down to make it fit on the fixtures. Looks like it wants to tear
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: We used this as our food tent at our daughters wedding had lots of thing to do for an outdoor so we wanted something to go up quick and easy it defiantly was the following weekend we used it for my son's 16th birthday party so nice we love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Canvas top leaks at every seam
customer_reviews.text: When unpacked them , we where at a show. Every seam leak when it rain why we were at the show and there was a rip in 1 of the seams when we opened it, but we had no choice but to use them.we were not very happy with the quality of the canvas but the structure itself was good.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal m Dow

customer_reviews.title: Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and solid. Bought for graduation party as forecasted to rain, set it up and of course it did not rain but it was great for shade for a party of 35-40 people.
customer_reviews.author: Tim B

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this product very good quality , and easy to set up .for the price it is an amazing deal. I recommend this product for anyone looking for a spacious.nice tent for things like parties wedding.etc
customer_reviews.author: xiaojing

customer_reviews.title: Seller acknowledges design flaw in fabric of top canopy of tent.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy frame, but poor quality fabric for the tent. Ripped on one corner on first use, see pictures. Seller Outdoor Basic sent me an email out of the blue acknowledging the design flaw and offering to send a replacement in August 2019, 30 days after my event, not indicating if free replacement or not. Disappointed, returning same.
customer_reviews.author: Paydirt

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This was shipped just in time for our event. It was exactly as described and worked well for what we needed. After comparing prices with many other competitors, I found that this was the best value.
customer_reviews.author: An Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is great! Easy to assemble. Good size with tons of height. Even comes with storage bag!
customer_reviews.author: Victor M. Castro

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting the quality to be that great but could not even make through a single use without it breaking. Cover very difficult to stretch over last corner and rips started immediately. Velcro corner ripped off with minimal tension and frame broke upon take down with minimal strain. I just don't think this accordion style EX pop up type design can work for a larger canopy, getting a carport
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Duhamel

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This started to fall apart by the third time we set it up. Not very sturdy. Spend a little more to get something that has a stronger frame.
customer_reviews.author: wolfkeep

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality and terrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The material is cheap, the stitching was not done correctly and the velcro was not stitched on one middle pole at all and the directions are unclear which caused a pole to go thru the top canopy corner. I would have never bought two of them if I would have known how cheaply it was manufactured
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your $
customer_reviews.text: Garbage, you will spend double the amount buying better Velcro and real tie downs and stakes and tape and wood and then the loops that hold the top to the frame will rip right off in the lightest wind, just don't even bother , trust me, call me first, 585-356-0230, call me , text me, i will send you video, this thing is garbage.
customer_reviews.author: john wahr

customer_reviews.title: I think I had higher standards
customer_reviews.text: I think I just expected something more. Poor directions that skip some steps. One of the metal frame legs was slightly bent. Need 4 people to hold each leg to open up the accordion frame. The fabric was sewn wrong on part of the top cover (see picture) and had to be cut to place over the frame. Seems to be holding up fine for now. I think I expected thicker top cover material.
customer_reviews.author: Dana B.

customer_reviews.title: Quality.price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this tent corresponds to the cheap price. We use them at least once a month in a place of business, they are easy to install, and they will last long if they are installed correctly. I will get some sandbags so that the windy weather will be more stable. In short, this purchase is very s
customer_reviews.author: allen

customer_reviews.title: Canopy material is to thin
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to set up, but canopy material is thin. The first time I used it one corner started to rip. The stakes are to small for the size of the canopy as well. The velcro on the side panels would come undone with the slightest breeze. Not happy with this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Esteban Rojo

customer_reviews.title: Great special use tent - short term use
customer_reviews.text: Great for a short term use. Material extremely thin. Extreme wind will be a problem. Does hold up to rain. Perfect for a special event and done.
customer_reviews.author: Michael h
